value:
I am feeling similar in both here and
Fódlan. It is a place I was brought,
different from my home.

Brigid is small islands with much
richness and greenness. For my land
of home, I would be giving the all.

Your concern for everyone has no
limit. I have admiration for that. I am
wishing to join you on your patrolling.

I would like to be hunting for prey,
but animals here are a puzzle to me.
I am needing your knowledge.

Different lands have different winds.
For a bow, this has much effect. I am
reading and studying of this.

I am being a messenger from your
friend $Nf!
Hard work created this.
War feeds my body and mind.

Disappointing, but I will not misplace
my heart.
My understanding has completion!

Hello. I am called Petra Macneary.
I am pleased to be meeting with...no,
I am pleased to have met you.

In Brigid, there is a phrase we say.
"A small flame will be burning to be
a large flame."$k$pI am thinking there was a small flame
between us that has grown into a
bigger flame.$k$pWhen I had distance from my land of
home, I was lonely and cold, but now
my heart is burning hot.$k$pThis is because of you. Do you have
understanding? You are causing my
happiness.$k$pI have been swearing to protect my
home, and now I promise the spirits,
I will also be giving protection to you.
はっ！
無駄です！
うあっ
失態……！
You will be slapped down!
I will remove you!
I will win!
I am aware of your weakness!
Must I be dying...on foreign soil?
Hehe
I can be teaching you my deadly techniques.
Attack! The enemy... Oh. You are having a joke?
The Wind Spirit is calling to you... Are you hearing it?
Flame Spirit, give us protection and victory!
You are smart and good. I am wanting to be useful to you.
I will be learning and gaining strength. For Brigid!
I wish to become your strength. With my entire heart!
Yes.
Where?
I will be going.
